title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 380-8.7 - Transfer of Permit
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 380-8.7 - Transfer of Permit

State Regulations

If a permit is transferred pursuant to Part 621 of this

Title, the permittee must transfer all records required by this Subpart to the
new permittee and the new permittee will be responsible for maintaining these
records for the specified retention period. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
380-8.7

Amended

New

York State Register April 25, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 17, eff. 5/10/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
